Package org.bff.javampd.art

Interface ArtworkFinder

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MPDArtworkFinder
    public interface ArtworkFinder
    Artwork finder looks in the path of an MPDArtist, MPDAlbum or path for images.

    MPD must have at least read access to this directory or nothing will be returned.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      List<MPDArtwork> find​(String path)
      Returns a list of MPDArtwork for images in the given path
      List<MPDArtwork> find​(MPDAlbum album)
      Returns a list of MPDArtwork for images in the given MPDAlbum
      List<MPDArtwork> find​(MPDAlbum album, String pathPrefix)
      Returns a list of MPDArtwork for images in the given MPDAlbum
      List<MPDArtwork> find​(MPDArtist artist)
      Returns a list of MPDArtwork for images in the given MPDArtist This will search both the artist path and all albums by the artist.
      List<MPDArtwork> find​(MPDArtist artist, String pathPrefix)
      Returns a list of MPDArtwork for images in the given MPDArtist This will search both the artist path and all albums by the artist.

    • Method Detail

      • find

        List<MPDArtwork> find​(MPDAlbum album)
        Returns a list of MPDArtwork for images in the given MPDAlbum
        Parameters:
        album - the album path to interrogate
        Returns:
        a list of MPDArtwork

      • find

        List<MPDArtwork> find​(MPDAlbum album,
                      String pathPrefix)
        Returns a list of MPDArtwork for images in the given MPDAlbum
        Parameters:
        album - the album path to interrogate
        pathPrefix - the prefix of the path if not running locally with the MPD server
        Returns:
        a list of MPDArtwork

      • find

        List<MPDArtwork> find​(MPDArtist artist)
        Returns a list of MPDArtwork for images in the given MPDArtist This will search both the artist path and all albums by the artist. This assumes you have the artist as part of the directory structure similar to this:

        '/music/artist/album/song.flac'

        If the artist is not there no attempt will be made to search the artist directory.
        Parameters:
        artist - the artist path to interrogate
        Returns:
        a list of MPDArtwork

      • find

        List<MPDArtwork> find​(MPDArtist artist,
                      String pathPrefix)
        Returns a list of MPDArtwork for images in the given MPDArtist This will search both the artist path and all albums by the artist. This assumes you have the artist as part of the directory structure similar to this:

        '/music/artist/album/song.flac'

        If the artist is not there no attempt will be made to search the artist directory.
        Parameters:
        artist - the artist path to interrogate
        pathPrefix - the prefix of the path if not running locally with the MPD server
        Returns:
        a list of MPDArtwork

      • find

        List<MPDArtwork> find​(String path)
        Returns a list of MPDArtwork for images in the given path
        Parameters:
        path - the path to interrogate
        Returns:
        a list of MPDArtwork
